<!-- Muhammad Rayan Portfolio Project Instructions -->

This is Muhammad Rayan's portfolio website built with Next.js 14, featuring:

## Project Requirements (SRS v2.0.0)
- **Hero Section**: Name, title "Software Engineer & Full Stack Developer", value proposition
- **Interactive Terminal**: Commands (whoami, stack, clear) 
- **Project Showcase**: Commercial/SaaS vs Engineering/R&D categories
- **About/Education**: BS SE from FAST NUCES
- **Contact Form**: With direct contact details
- **Dark Theme**: Matte black (#0F172A), electric yellow (#FACC15), code blue (#3B82F6)
- **Performance**: 90+ Lighthouse score
- **SEO**: Optimized meta tags
- **Responsive**: Mobile, tablet, desktop

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- SEO optimization
